result.name: fladen-experimental-fishing-impact-recovery-data-2015-2m-beam-trawl
result.notes:
Total count and biomass in grams of taxa identified from 2m beam trawl samples 
of the seabed, with associated station information. Samples were collected 
using a 2m scientific beam trawl at sampling stations located within three 
experimental boxes (treatment boxes only) during a fishing impact recovery 
survey within the Fladen Grounds. Data were collected at three time points 
(before impact (time 0), immediately after impact (time 1) and 8 months after 
impact (time 2) during two research surveys on the RV Cefas Endeavour in April 
2015 and November 2015.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: Fladen experimental fishing impact recovery data 2015 - 2m Beam Trawl

resources.description: The Cefas Data Portal contains metadata records and data sets available to download and connect to in support of our commitment to open science. Data is available in the following formats: CSV, ESRI Shapefile. The data can also be accessed via the WFS and WMS protocols.
resources.name: Cefas Data Portal
